name: unsure-calc
title: Unsure Calc
description: Lightweight probabilistic calculator that lets you type ranges (with `~`) and arithmetic to see exact bounds plus simulated outcomes and a text histogram.
author: PythonicNinja

preferences.name: samples
preferences.title: Number of Samples
preferences.description: Number of Monte Carlo samples for simulation

preferences.name: histogramBins
preferences.title: Histogram Bins
preferences.description: Number of bins in the histogram

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
